name: drifting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
moving slowly, usually with no one or nothing controlling the direction: He fell asleep at the wheel of the drifting ship. Dark, drifting clouds covered the moon.
being blown into piles by the wind: drifting snow The drifting snow made driving extremely dangerous. Piles of drifting leaves gathered in the corners of the garden.
More examplesFewer examplesThe drifting balloon was tracked by radar until help could reach it.A drifting cloud of dust blew across the desert.Drifting smoke from a forest fire has closed the road.The crew were found floating on a life raft near their drifting boat. The freezing blizzards and drifting snow kept everyone indoors.
